## {.tabset}

```{r cumulative-returns}
returns <- PortfReturns(Account = account)

src <- map(
  .x = sort(names(returns)), 
  .f = function(x) {
    knitr::knit_expand(
      file = here::here("./children/child_cumulative_returns.Rmd"), 
      symbol = str_match(x, pattern = "(.+).DailyEqPL")[,2], 
      colname = x
    )
  }
)
```

`r knitr::knit(text = unlist(src))`
